Note: For other MSS see 5672; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4687.
_description: Gospel for Second Sunday in Advent, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
To daye saynte luke tellis vsIn oure godpell what
                    ihesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of ataken i herd of tellþat falles wele till oure
                    gospell

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO day seynt Luc telleþ vsIn vre gospel þat
                    Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of a toknyng I haue herd telleÞat falleþ wel to my
                    spelle
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
To day saynt luk tels vsIn oure gospell þat Ihesus
                    …
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…Of a takynyng hard I tellÞat fals wele to oure
                    godspell

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
On a day sante luke telles vsIn oure gospell þe whilk
                    ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Off a takenyng herd I tellThat þis day falles wole till
                    our gospell

EDCPCM.First Lines:
[T]O day sain louk telles usIn our godspell þat
                    iesus…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…And al ded men sal riseAnd cum bifor crist our
                    iustise
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Nota iia aduentus domini secundum lucam; Incipit
                        explanacio eiusdem euangelii ad lateram (f. 18vb)

Lam260.First Lines:
TO day saynt luk telles þusIn oure gospell what
                    ihesus…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…& of a takenyg I herd of tellÞat falles wele tyll
                    oure gospell
